name: book-it
description: ## App Idea/User Story An app for book worms who have an evergrowing collection of their own and an unmanageable wishlist and list of recommendations. This site will be made to help keep their collections organized. It will have a separate page for each collection (owned, wishlist, recommendations). The user can add books in any of the collections with a title, genre, synopsis, your own thoughts, a price(not required) and a recommended by(also not required).
